verses.verse: Now these are the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881> that went up <WH5927> <WH8804> with Z'rubavel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, and Jeshua <WH3442>: Seraiah <WH8304>, Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, Ezra <WH5830>,
Amariah <WH568>, Malluch <WH4409>, Hattush <WH2407>,
Shechaniah <WH7935>, Rehum <WH7348>, Meremoth <WH4822>,
Iddo <WH5714>, Ginnetho <WH1599>, AbiYAH <WH29>,
Miamin <WH4326>, Maadiah <WH4573>, Bilgah <WH1083>,
Shemaiah <WH8098>, and Joiarib <WH3114>, Jedaiah <WH3048>,
Sallu <WH5543>, Amok <WH5987>, Hilkiah <WH2518>, Jedaiah <WH3048>. These were the chief <WH7218> of the Kohanim <WH3548> and of their brethren <WH251> in the days <WH3117> of Jeshua <WH3442>.

Moreover the L'vi'im <WH3881>: Jeshua <WH3442>, Binnui <WH1131>, Kadmiel <WH6934>, Sherebiah <WH8274>, Y'hudah <WH3063>, and Mattaniah <WH4983>, which was over the thanksgiving <WH1960>, he and his brethren <WH251>.
Also Bakbukiah <WH1229> and Unni <WH6042>, their brethren <WH251>, were over against them in the watches <WH4931>.
And Jeshua <WH3442> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Joiakim <WH3113>, Joiakim <WH3113> also begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Eliyahhib <WH475>, and Eliyahhib <WH475> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Joiada <WH3111>,
And Joiada <WH3111> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Y'honatan <WH3129>, and Y'honatan <WH3129> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Jaddua <WH3037>.
And in the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> were Kohanim <WH3548>, the chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>: of Seraiah <WH8304>, Meraiah <WH4811>; of Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, Hananiah <WH2608>;
Of Ezra <WH5830>, Meshullam <WH4918>; of Amariah <WH568>, Jehohanan <WH3076>;
Of Melicu <WH4409>, Y'honatan <WH3129>; of SH'vaniah <WH7645>, Yosef <WH3130>;
Of Harim <WH2766>, Adna <WH5733>; of Meraioth <WH4812>, Helkai <WH2517>;
Of Iddo <WH5714>, Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>; of Ginnethon <WH1599>, Meshullam <WH4918>;
Of AbiYAH <WH29>, Zichri <WH2147>; of Miniamin <WH4509>, of Moadiah <WH4153>, Piltai <WH6408>;
Of Bilgah <WH1083>, Shammua <WH8051>; of Shemaiah <WH8098>, Jehonathan <WH3083>;
And of Joiarib <WH3114>, Mattenai <WH4982>; of Jedaiah <WH3048>, Uzzi <WH5813>;
Of Sallai <WH5543>, Kallai <WH7040>; of Amok <WH5987>, Eber <WH5677>;
Of Hilkiah <WH2518>, Hashabiah <WH2811>; of Jedaiah <WH3048>, Nethaneel <WH5417>.

The L'vi'im <WH3881> in the days <WH3117> of Eliyahhib <WH475>, Joiada <WH3111>, and Johanan <WH3110>, and Jaddua <WH3037>, were recorded <WH3789> <WH8803> chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>: also the Kohanim <WH3548>, to the reign <WH4438> of Darius <WH1867> the Persian <WH6542>.

The sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, the chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>, were written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697>, even until the days <WH3117> of Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Eliyahhib <WH475>.

And the chief <WH7218> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>: Hashabiah <WH2811>, Sherebiah <WH8274>, and Jeshua <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Kadmiel <WH6934>, with their brethren <WH251> over against them, to praise <WH1984> <WH8763> and to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687>, according to the Mitzvah <WH4687> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, ward <WH4929> over against <WH5980> ward <WH4929>.

Mattaniah <WH4983>, and Bakbukiah <WH1229>, `Ovadyah-yahu <WH5662>, Meshullam <WH4918>, Talmon <WH2929>, Akkub <WH6126>, were porters <WH7778> keeping <WH8104> <WH8802> the ward <WH4929> at the thresholds <WH624> of the gates <WH8179>.

These were in the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3442>, the son <WH1121> of Jozadak <WH3136>, and in the days <WH3117> of Nechemyah <WH5166> the governor <WH6346>, and of Ezra <WH5830> the Kohen <WH3548>, the scribe <WH5608> <WH8802>.

And at the dedication <WH2598> of the wall <WH2346> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> they sought <WH1245> <WH8765> the L'vi'im <WH3881> out of all their places <WH4725>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> them to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, to keep <WH6213> <WH8800> the dedication <WH2598> with gladness <WH8057>, both with thanksgivings <WH8426>, and with singing <WH7892>, with cymbals <WH4700>, psalteries <WH5035>, and with harps <WH3658>.

And the sons <WH1121> of the singers <WH7891> <WH8789> gathered themselves together <WH622> <WH8735>, both out of the plain country <WH3603> round about <WH5439> Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and from the villages <WH2691> of Netophathi <WH5200>;

Also from the house <WH1004> of Gilgal <WH1537> <WH8677> <WH1019>, and out of the fields <WH7704> of Geba <WH1387> and Azmaveth <WH5820>: for the singers <WH7891> <WH8789> had builded <WH1129> <WH8804> them villages <WH2691> round about <WH5439> Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
And the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881> purified <WH2891> <WH8691> themselves, and purified <WH2891> <WH8762> the people <WH5971>, and the gates <WH8179>, and the wall <WH2346>.

Then I brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> the princes <WH8269> of Y'hudah <WH3063> upon the wall <WH2346>, and appointed <WH5975> <WH8686> two <WH8147> great <WH1419> companies of them that gave thanks <WH8426>, whereof one went <WH8418> on the right hand <WH3225> upon the wall <WH2346> toward the dung <WH830> gate <WH8179>:
And after <WH310> them went <WH3212> <WH8799> Hoshaiah <WH1955>, and half <WH2677> of the princes <WH8269> of Y'hudah <WH3063>,
And Azariah <WH5838>, Ezra <WH5830>, and Meshullam <WH4918>,
Y'hudah <WH3063>, and Binyamin <WH1144>, and Shemaiah <WH8098>, and Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>,

And certain of the Kohanim <WH3548> ' sons <WH1121> with shofars <WH2689>; namely, Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Y'honatan <WH3129>, the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah <WH8098>, the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah <WH4983>, the son <WH1121> of Michaiah <WH4320>, the son <WH1121> of Zaccur <WH2139>, the son <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>:

And his brethren <WH251>, Shemaiah <WH8098>, and Azarael <WH5832>, Milalai <WH4450>, Gilalai <WH1562>, Maai <WH4597>, Nethaneel <WH5417>, and Y'hudah <WH3063>, Hanani <WH2607>, with the musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and Ezra <WH5830> the scribe <WH5608> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them.

And at the fountain <WH5869> gate <WH8179>, which was over against them, they went up <WH5927> <WH8804> by the stairs <WH4609> of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, at the going up <WH4608> of the wall <WH2346>, above the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>, even unto the water <WH4325> gate <WH8179> eastward <WH4217>.

And the other <WH8145> company of them that gave thanks <WH8426> went <WH1980> <WH8802> over against <WH4136> them, and I after <WH310> them, and the half <WH2677> of the people <WH5971> upon the wall <WH2346>, from beyond the tower <WH4026> of the furnaces <WH8574> even unto the broad <WH7342> wall <WH2346>;

And from above the gate <WH8179> of Efrayim <WH669>, and above the old <WH3465> gate <WH8179>, and above the fish <WH1709> gate <WH8179>, and the tower <WH4026> of Hananeel <WH2606>, and the tower <WH4026> of Meah <WH3968>, even unto the sheep <WH6629> gate <WH8179>: and they stood still <WH5975> <WH8804> in the prison <WH4307> gate <WH8179>.
So stood <WH5975> <WH8799> the two <WH8147> companies of them that gave thanks <WH8426> in the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and I, and the half <WH2677> of the rulers <WH5461> with me:
And the Kohanim <WH3548>; Eliakim <WH471>, Maaseiah <WH4641>, Miniamin <WH4509>, Michaiah <WH4320>, Elioenai <WH454>, Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>, and Hananiah <WH2608>, with shofars <WH2689>;

And Maaseiah <WH4641>, and Shemaiah <WH8098>, and Eleazar <WH499>, and Uzzi <WH5813>, and Jehohanan <WH3076>, and MalchiYAH <WH4441>, and Elam <WH5867>, and Ezer <WH5829>. And the singers <WH7891> <WH8789> sang loud <WH8085> <WH8686>, with Jezrahiah <WH3156> their overseer <WH6496>.

Also that day <WH3117> they offered <WH2076> <WH8799> great <WH1419> sacrifices <WH2077>, and rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8799>: for 'Elohim <WH430> had made them rejoice <WH8055> <WH8765> with great <WH1419> joy <WH8057>: the wives <WH802> also and the children <WH3206> rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8804>: so that the joy <WH8057> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> was heard <WH8085> <WH8735> even afar off <WH7350>.

And at that time <WH3117> were some <WH582> appointed <WH6485> <WH8735> over the chambers <WH5393> for the treasures <WH214>, for the offerings <WH8641>, for the firstfruits <WH7225>, and for the tithes <WH4643>, to gather <WH3664> <WH8800> into them out of the fields <WH7704> of the cities <WH5892> the portions <WH4521> of the Torah <WH8451> for the Kohanim <WH3548> and L'vi'im <WH3881>: for Y'hudah <WH3063> rejoiced <WH8057> for the Kohanim <WH3548> and for the L'vi'im <WH3881> that waited <WH5975> <WH8802>.

And both the singers <WH7891> <WH8789> and the porters <WH7778> kept <WH8104> <WH8799> the ward <WH4931> of their 'Elohim <WH430>, and the ward <WH4931> of the purification <WH2893>, according to the Mitzvah <WH4687> of David <WH1732>, and of SHlomo <WH8010> his son <WH1121>.

For in the days <WH3117> of David <WH1732> and Asaph <WH623> of old <WH6924> there were chief <WH7218> of the singers <WH7891> <WH8789>, and songs <WH7892> of praise <WH8416> and thanksgiving <WH3034> <WH8687> unto 'Elohim <WH430>.

And all Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of Z'rubavel <WH2216>, and in the days <WH3117> of Nechemyah <WH5166>, gave <WH5414> <WH8802> the portions <WH4521> of the singers <WH7891> <WH8789> and the porters <WH7778>, every day <WH3117> his portion <WH1697>: and they sanctified <WH6942> <WH8688> holy things unto the L'vi'im <WH3881>; and the L'vi'im <WH3881> sanctified <WH6942> <WH8688> them unto the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>.
